## Overview

### The Problem
Job seekers waste **20+ hours per week** manually searching LinkedIn, Indeed, and other platforms. There's no centralized way to:

- Track which skills are most in-demand
- Compare salaries across companies and experience levels
- Get instant alerts for matching opportunities
- Understand market trends over time

### The Solution

This platform automates the entire job discovery process:

|:---|:---|:---|
| **Multi-Source Scraping** | Python (Requests, BeautifulSoup, Selenium) | âœ… Live |

## Running Locally

### Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/gondamol/job-market-intelligence.git
cd job-market-intelligence

# Create virtual environment
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run the dashboard
streamlit run dashboard/app.py
```

### Refresh Data

```bash
# Run all scrapers
python3 scripts/run_all_scrapers.py

# Update dashboard data
python3 scripts/update_dashboard_data.py
```

### Scheduled Scraping

```bash
# Set up cron job (every 6 hours)
chmod +x scripts/setup_cron.sh
./scripts/setup_cron.sh
```
